text: On the Border Mexican Grill & Cantina is a chain of Tex-Mex food casual dining restaurants located in the United States and South Korea. It has 150 restaurants. The restaurant is known for its selection of fajitas and wide selection of margaritas. It is also known for "Guacamole Live," the preparation of fresh guacamole tableside. Category:American restaurants Category:1982 establishments in the United States
title: On the Border Mexican Grill & Cantina
